Lund-Browder burn diagram and table. Lund-Browder burn diagram and table indicate the varying proportions in surface area in persons with different ages. A careful burn diagram should be completed at the time of initial evaluation, including wound size, location, and estimated burn depth. Lund-Browder chart should be used in pediatric patients because the body surface area relationships vary with age. The letters and numbers on the y and x axes can be used to demarcate site-specific changes. TBSA = total body surface area.
